scripts.dev:backend: cd apps/backend && uv run uvicorn src.app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.test:integration: cd apps/backend && uv run pytest tests/integration/ -v
scripts.test:integration:watch: cd apps/backend && uv run pytest tests/integration/ -v --watch
scripts.test:integration:cov: cd apps/backend && uv run pytest tests/integration/ --cov
scripts.lint:backend: cd apps/backend && uv run ruff check .
scripts.lint:backend:fix: cd apps/backend && uv run ruff check . --fix
scripts.format: prettier --write . && cd apps/backend && uv run ruff format .
scripts.db:upgrade: cd apps/backend && uv run alembic upgrade head
scripts.db:downgrade: cd apps/backend && uv run alembic downgrade -1
scripts.db:revision: cd apps/backend && uv run alembic revision --autogenerate
scripts.db:history: cd apps/backend && uv run alembic history
scripts.db:current: cd apps/backend && uv run alembic current
scripts.db:seed: cd apps/backend && uv run python scripts/seed_rbac.py
scripts.db:status: cd apps/backend && uv run python scripts/db_status.py
